scripts.clean: rm -rf build && mkdir build && mkdir build/images && mkdir build/fonts
scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run html && npm run images && npm run fonts && npm run stylus:server
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run html && npm run images && npm run fonts && npm run stylus:build && npm run js:build
scripts.server: npm run prepare && parallelshell 'npm run js:server' 'npm run httpserver'
scripts.httpserver: light-server -b 0.0.0.0 -s build -p 8080 -w 'app/styles/**/*styl # npm run stylus:server # reloadcss' -w 'app/index.html # npm run html'
scripts.js:build: browserify app/scripts/main.js -t babelify > build/main.js && npm run uglifyjs
